alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Jackson; Liberty; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Jackson, Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Gadsden and north central Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southeastern Washington County in the Panhandle of Florida, central Decatur and central Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 300 PM EDT/200 PM CDT/... At 226 PM EDT/126 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Quincy to 11 miles northwest of Blountstown to Panama City. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Quincy, Marianna, Bainbridge, Blountstown, Springfield, Hiland Park, Chattahoochee, Greensboro, West Bainbridge, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, Sneads, Gretna, Grand Ridge, Altha and Alford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Jackson; Liberty; Washington
